entities.name: house points
entities.description: House points are being spilled everywhere, causing people to slip and stagger as they run.

entities.name: fenrir greyback
entities.description: Fenrir Greyback is a person who is attacking Lavender Brown. He is thrown backward by Hermione's wand and hit the marble banisters.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is a person who is being attacked by Fenrir Greyback, but is saved by Hermione's wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione uses her wand to throw Fenrir Greyback backward and save Lavender Brown.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a person who is shouting 'I have more!' and throwing crystal balls across the hall.

relationships.description: Hermione uses her wand to throw Fenrir Greyback backward from Lavender Brown.
Professor Trelawney throws a crystal ball across the hall, causing it to smash through a window.
